Excellent, thanks! Just a heads up; Order of Pheonix SRT is not a clean SRT. Does not work in some hardware players.
Fix: Download Aegissub, install, rename Bla-bla-bla-Pheonix-eng.srt to same but .SSA. Open in Aegissub. Export as .SRT. Good to go.
Fix: Download Aegissub, install, rename Bla-bla-bla-Pheonix-eng.srt to same but .ASS. Open in Aegissub. Export as .SRT. Good to go.
